1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.TermGadget
4  ( ropsTermGadget,
5    -- * prefix
6    consPrefix, relmapPrefix, relkitPrefix,
7    -- * unprefix
8    consUnprefix, relmapUnprefix, relkitUnprefix,
9    -- * prefix-change
10    consPrefixChange, relmapPrefixChange, relkitPrefixChange,
11    -- * wipe
12    consWipe, relmapWipe, relkitWipe,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Data.List                   as List
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data        as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core        as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base    as Op
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Term    as Op
20
21
22-- | Relmap operators for manipulating term names.
23--
24--   [@prefix \/P \/N ...@]
25--     Add prefix @\/P@ to terms @\/N@ ...
26-- 
27--   [@prefix-change \/P \/Q@]
28--     Change prefix from @\/P@ to @\/Q@.
29-- 
30--   [@unprefix \/P@]
31--     Remove prefix @\/P@ from term name.
32-- 
33--   [@wipe@]
34--     Cut working terms.
35-- 
36ropsTermGadget :: (Ord c) => [C.Rop c]
37ropsTermGadget = Op.ropList "term"  -- GROUP
38    --        CONSTRUCTOR        USAGE                      ATTRIBUTE
39    [ Op.def  consPrefix         "prefix /N -to /P ..."     "pos : -prefix -term* | to : -prefix . -to"
40    , Op.def  consPrefixChange   "prefix-change /P /Q"      "-new -old"
41    , Op.def  consUnprefix       "unprefix /P"              "-prefix"
42    , Op.def  consWipe           "wipe"                     ""
43    ]
44
45
46-- ----------------------  prefix
47
48-- | Add prefix to specified terms.
49consPrefix :: C.RopCons c
50consPrefix med =
51    do let tag = Op.getTag med "to"
52       pre <- Op.getTerm  med "-prefix"
53       to  <- Op.getTerms med $ if tag then "-to" else "-term"
54       Right $ relmapPrefix med pre to
55
56-- | Create @prefix@ relmap.
57relmapPrefix :: C.Intmed c -> String -> [String] -> C.Relmap c
58relmapPrefix med pre ns = C.relmapFlow med $ relkitPrefix pre ns
59
60-- | Create @prefix@ relkit.
61relkitPrefix :: String -> [String] -> C.RelkitFlow c
62relkitPrefix _ _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
63relkitPrefix pre ns (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
64    he2 =  D.headMapName f he1
65    kit2 = C.relkitId $ Just he2
66    f n | n `elem` ns  = prefixName pre n
67        | otherwise    = n
68
69prefixName :: String -> String -> String
70prefixName pre ns = pre ++ "-" ++ ns
71
72
73-- ----------------------  unprefix
74
75-- | Remove prefix.
76consUnprefix :: C.RopCons c
77consUnprefix med =
78    do pre <- Op.getTerm med "-prefix"
79       Right $ relmapUnprefix med pre
80
81-- | Create @unprefix@ relmap.
82relmapUnprefix :: C.Intmed c -> String -> C.Relmap c
83relmapUnprefix med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitUnprefix
84
85-- | Create @unprefix@ relkit.
86relkitUnprefix :: String -> C.RelkitFlow c
87relkitUnprefix _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
88relkitUnprefix pre (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
89    he2  = D.headMapName (unprefixName pre) he1
90    kit2 = C.relkitId $ Just he2
91
92unprefixName :: String -> String -> String
93unprefixName pre n =
94    case List.stripPrefix pre n of
95      Just ('-' : n2) -> n2
96      _ -> n
97
98
99-- ----------------------  prefix-change
100
101-- | Change prefix.
102consPrefixChange :: C.RopCons c
103consPrefixChange med =
104    do new <- Op.getTerm med "-new"
105       old <- Op.getTerm med "-old"
106       Right $ relmapPrefixChange med (new, old)
107
108-- | Create @prefix-change@ relmap.
109relmapPrefixChange :: C.Intmed c -> (String, String) -> C.Relmap c
110relmapPrefixChange med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitPrefixChange
111
112-- | Create @prefix-change@ relkit.
113relkitPrefixChange :: (String, String) -> C.RelkitFlow c
114relkitPrefixChange _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
115relkitPrefixChange (new, old) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
116    he2  = D.headMapName f he1
117    kit2 = C.relkitId $ Just he2
118    new' = new ++ "-"
119    old' = old ++ "-"
120    f n' = case List.stripPrefix old' n' of
121             Just n2 -> new' ++ n2
122             Nothing -> n'
123
124
125-- ----------------------  wipe
126
127consWipe :: C.RopCons c
128consWipe = Right . relmapWipe
129
130-- | Create @wipe@ relmap.
131relmapWipe :: C.Intmed c -> C.Relmap c
132relmapWipe med = C.relmapFlow med relkitWipe
133
134-- | Create @wipe@ relkit.
135relkitWipe :: C.RelkitFlow c
136relkitWipe Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
137relkitWipe (Just he1) = Op.relkitCut ns1 (Just he1) where
138    ns1 = filter (elem '=') $ D.getTermNames he1
